aboutText.span1: Hi! I’m Jonatan Ljung — a web developer with just over two years of experience at INBooks. I'm currently looking for new opportunities where I can contribute with both technical skill and creative thinking, while continuing to grow in my career.
aboutText.span2: My background is in full-stack web development, with hands-on experience in Java, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. I’ve worked extensively with Angular and AngularJS to build user-friendly, dynamic applications. More recently, I’ve started diving into C# and Flutter to broaden my skill set and explore new areas of development.
aboutText.span3: I’m based in Växjö but open to roles across southern Sweden — or remote! I'm known for being creative, detail-oriented, and solution-focused, which led to me taking on additional responsibility for UI quality assurance in my previous role. That also meant close collaboration with designers, product owners, and business analysts, which I genuinely enjoyed.
aboutText.span4: If you're looking for someone with a mix of technical know-how, creativity, and a friendly team spirit — let’s talk!

item1.title: Who am I?
item1.description: My name is Jonatan Ljung, a web developer with just over two years of experience at INBooks. I’m currently on the lookout for new opportunities where I can contribute with both technical skills and creative thinking — and keep growing as a developer.

item2.title: What I bring?
item2.description: I have a full-stack background with experience in Java, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. I’ve worked extensively with Angular and AngularJS to build dynamic, user-friendly applications. Lately, I’ve been diving into C# and Flutter to expand my toolkit even further.

item3.title: Why me?
item3.description: I’m based in Växjö, but open to remote work or roles across southern Sweden. I’m creative, detail-oriented, and solution-focused — traits that led me to take on UI quality assurance and collaborate closely with designers, product owners, and analysts in my previous role. If you're after someone who combines tech skills with a strong team spirit — let’s talk!

item1.description: Labour market training course focusing on C#, but also React, database design and some AI engineering. In addition to this there's also a roughly three month long internship towards the end.

heroSection.homeIntroduction: With two years of experience I’m passionate about creating dynamic and user-friendly web solutions. Proficient in a wide range of programming languages and technologies, and dedicated to delivering high-quality websites that meet both customer and user needs.
